item.title: 377,000 Impacted by Data Breach at Texas Gas Station Firm
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Gulshan Management Services has informed authorities about a recent data breach resulting from a ransomware attack.

The post 377,000 Impacted by Data Breach at Texas Gas Station Firm appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Exploit for VMware Zero-Day Flaws Likely Built a Year Before Public Disclosure
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Fresh attacks targeted three VMware ESXi vulnerabilities that were disclosed in March 2025 as zero-days.

The post Exploit for VMware Zero-Day Flaws Likely Built a Year Before Public Disclosure appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: UK Government Unveils New Cyber Action Plan
item.dc:creator: Kevin Townsend
item.description:
The UK government’s cyber action plan is by the government for the government, and has no advice for the private sector nor CNI.

The post UK Government Unveils New Cyber Action Plan appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: CrowdStrike to Buy Identity Security Firm SGNL for $740 Million in Cash
item.dc:creator: Mike Lennon
item.description:
The deal aims to bolster CrowdStrike's Falcon platform with "continuous identity" protection to secure human and AI-driven access in real-time.

The post CrowdStrike to Buy Identity Security Firm SGNL for $740 Million in Cash appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Blackbird.AI Raises $28 Million for Narrative Intelligence Platform
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The company will use the funds to enhance its AI-based narrative intelligence technology platform and accelerate go-to-market efforts.

The post Blackbird.AI Raises $28 Million for Narrative Intelligence Platform appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Cyera Raises $400 Million at $9 Billion Valuation
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
The New York-based data security company has tripled its valuation in just one year. 

The post Cyera Raises $400 Million at $9 Billion Valuation appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Rethinking Security for Agentic AI
item.dc:creator: Etay Maor
item.description:
When software can think and act on its own, security strategies must shift from static policy enforcement to real-time behavioral governance.

The post Rethinking Security for Agentic AI appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Critical Vulnerability Patched in jsPDF
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The bug can allow attackers to read arbitrary files from the system, potentially exposing configurations and credentials.

The post Critical Vulnerability Patched in jsPDF appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Critical Vulnerability Exposes n8n Instances to Takeover Attacks
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Tracked as CVE-2026-21858 (CVSS score 10), the bug enables remote code execution without authentication.

The post Critical Vulnerability Exposes n8n Instances to Takeover Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Researchers Expose WHILL Wheelchair Safety Risks via Remote Hacking
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
CISA advisory warns that unauthenticated Bluetooth access in WHILL devices allows for unauthorized movement.

The post Researchers Expose WHILL Wheelchair Safety Risks via Remote Hacking appeared first on SecurityWeek.
